column4: Can anyone help with azureus. I'm behind a fast pipe, how many connections should be optimal to put on "maximum simultaneus outbond..." it has a default of 8 connections but I found that increasing this number to 32 is much faster... should I  max it to 100?
your router should be able to handle more but probably not 100 the simultaneoud outbound is made 8 because of windows limitation but ubuntu does not have this.
so i would set it to like 30
